# =========================================
# MATLAB / Simulink project .gitignore
# Official-style template for macOS users
# =========================================

# MATLAB temporary and autosave files
*.asv
*.m~ 
*.mex*
*.mdl.r*
*.slx.r*
*.autosave

# MATLAB backup and crash files
*.bak
*.orig
*.tmp
*.log
*.stack
*.crash
*.autobackup

# Simulink cache and build folders
slprj/
sccprj/
codegen/
cache/
matlabcache/
simulinkcache/
work/
*_ert_rtw/
*_grt_rtw/
*_slrt_rtw/
*_pil/
*_rtw/

# Simscape and model advisor generated files
simscape/
modeladvisor/
derived/
slcov_output/
slprj/*/
html/

# MATLAB compiled packages
*.mlpkginstall
*.mltbx
*.mlappinstall

# MATLAB preferences and settings
matlabprefs.mat
history.m
*.prj
*.matlab
*.matlabprefs
*.settings
*.slxc

# Reports and profiling output
*.xml
*.csv
*.pdf
*.html
*.docx
*.xls*
profile_results/
coverage/
logs/
test_results/

# OS-specific (macOS)
.DS_Store
.AppleDouble
.LSOverride
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
.DS_Store?
Icon?
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# VS Code and JetBrains IDEs
.vscode/
.idea/
*.code-workspace

# Git and version control safety
.gitignore
.gitmodules
.gitconfig
index.lock
